description:
Enterprise Mongolia Project - Phase 2
The project aims to improve livelihoods of the poor men and women, particularly in rural areas and to contribute to achieving the MDG 1 in Mongolia, through income increase and job creation.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
1. Self-sustainable business operation of the project beneficiaries (Enhanced business capacity of SMEs and micro and small entrepreneurs) 
2. Sustainable SME support mechanism through the EMCs on the ground (Enhanced operational capacity and financial independence of the four EMCs)
3. Full integration of the OVOPI component under the project into the National OVOP Programme
subproject.title: Enterprise Mongolia Project 2
